misc.download: ダウンロードするにはここをクリック
misc.mediaplayer_nothing_playing: 現在何も再生されていません
misc.new_version: 新しいバージョンが利用可能です
misc.enter_pincode: PINコードを入力してください
misc.wrong_code: PINコードが間違っています

settings.blocksave: Save the code below to your CONFIG.js to apply the changes. Reload Dashticz afterwards.

garbage.garbage_calendar_id_help: Your calendar id is found in calendar settings
garbage.garbage_hideicon: ブロックのアイコンを非表示にする
garbage.garbage_use_prefix_help: The CORS prefix sometimes causes errors
garbage.google_api_key_help: Google API key is needed for Google Garbage Calendar
garbage.title: Garbage

general.auto_positioning_help: Don't want to configure positions in CONFIG.JS, select this option
general.disable_googleanalytics_help: Only used for developer to track the amount of users and which device you are using for fine-tuning Dashticz.
general.domoticz_ip_help: Enter Domoticz URL, for example: http://192.168.1.1:8080. You can also enter users and password, for example: http://user:password@192.168.1.1:8080
general.hide_off_button: セレクタスイッチのボタンを非表示にする
general.no_rgb: Do not use colorpicker for RGB devices.
general.room_plan: 部屋プランIDを使用（0 =すべて）
general.room_plan_help: Change to the id of the room plan you created in Domoticz, do not use with favorites
general.title: General
general.use_favorites_help: Only used when using auto positioning
general.user_name_help: Dashticzのユーザー名とパスワードを設定する
general.disable_update_check: 更新チェックを無効にする
general.standby_call_url: URL to be called at start of standby
general.standby_call_url_on_end: URL to be called at end of standby
general.login_timeout: Dashticzのログイン状態を保つ (分単位)
general.enable_websocket_help: WebSocket接続を有効/無効にする
general.colorpicker: Choose the default RGB colorpicker for RGB devices.
general.colorpicker_help: 0: No RGB colorpicker, 1: Old style RGB colorpicker, 2: New style RGB colorpicker

settings.infosave: By default, settings are stored in your browser. Downside of this method is it will only work in your current browser. If that's not a problem, you can proceed. Otherwise, copy code below to your CONFIG.JS to keep settings across all browsers and devices.

localize.gm_zoomlevel: Googleマップのズームレベル
localize.speak_language: テキスト読み上げ言語
localize.title: ローカライズ

media.host_nzbget_help: NZBgetを使用する場合は、IPアドレスとポートを入力します。例：http://192.168.1.32:8080
media.switch_horizon_help: If you have a mediabox from ZIGGO or UPC (Horizon), copy switch_horizon.php on a webserver inside your network and change the IP (of Horizon) inside this file.
media.title: メディア

screen.auto_slide_pages: Auto slide screens (seconds, 0=do not auto slide)
screen.auto_swipe_back_to_help: When no activity, swipe back to main screen after x seconds
screen.background_image_help: Set path to background image e.g. img/bg2.jpg or http://yourimage.com/image.jpg
screen.dashticz_themes_help: Set the name of the theme (e.g. white) the theme will be overridden by custom.css
screen.title: 画面
screen.security_button_icons: Icons instead of text on security switch
screen.blink_color_help: Set flash color and opacity (red, green, blue, alpha)
screen.start_page: 開始ページ番号 (最初のページ=1)
screen.enable_swiper_help: 0: Disable Swiper; 1: Enable on narrow screens; 2: Enable
screen.vertical_scroll: 垂直スクロールを有効にする
screen.vertical_scroll_help: 0: Disable vertical scroll; 1: Enable vertical scroll if Swiper is disabled; 2: Enable vertical scroll
screen.security_panel_lock_help: If set the Security Panel in Domoticz or Dashticz to 'Arm - Away', then Dashticz will automatically load a full screen panel.

weather.idx_moonpicture_help: Take a look at the wiki to learn how to add an image of the current moon phase.
weather.title: 天気
weather.owm_city: Open Weather Map Station (City or Code)
weather.owm_cnt_help: Number of columns to show. If showing days, max is 5
weather.owm_days_help: Off shows the Open Weather Map default 3 hour forecast
weather.owm_min_help: Only shown when forecast in days
weather.owm_lang: Set language for the description of the forecast (rain, cloudy, etc.)

other.title: その他
other.setpoint_min: サーモスタット設定の最小値
other.setpoint_max: サーモスタット設定の最大値
other.evohome_status: EvoHomeコントローラーの状態
other.evohome_status_help: Auto, Economy, Away, Custom, Day Off, Off
other.evohome_boost_zone: EvoHome zone boost time in minutes
other.evohome_boost_hw: EvoHome hot water boost time in minutes
